title: DID Solutions for Local Governments
description: In Japan, solutions in the society and the industry using Japan national IDs is not popular yet.

title: CCC: PRISM RIDE @MOA; 40M Visits/yr
description: **40M MOA visit/yr to be invited to Atala PRISM. "Credential Wealth" unlocks possibilities, currently no experiences offer mass-scale adoption**

title: Play-to-learn-and-earn DID-Platform
description: Millions of people are excluded from invaluable learning material and business opportunity due to their location, language or infrastructure

title: Decentralized eLearning & DIDs
description: Digital education in Latin America has low efficiency, is costly, and is not able to reach a larger audience.

title: Cardano Sign-In
description: There is no alternative to the popular Google/Facebook sign-in services which are independent and community managed

title: BIT - Basic Income Token
description:
**Users** in Atala are on-boarded by DID-Providers, lack **incentive** to explore the Cardano **ecosystem**.

Providers lack incentive to cooperate.

title: PACE: Community credentials
description: There is a lack of tools/examples for community projects to easily integrate Atala Prism which reduces the speed of adoption

title: Aegis Esports DID Platform
description: The Esports industry struggles with stagnating amateur and professional scenes and inefficient talent & knowledge discovery and preservation

title: DID in Congo Universities
description: With hundreds of universities created since 1994, checking credentials is costly and sometimes impossible, leading to cases of fraud.

title: Control your data (vault) via PRISM
description: Today, companies have your data and (mis)use it for their benefit; whereas you should control and benefit from the use of your personal data

title: Dyana holistic health DID
description: Personal Health data needs to be more integrated, precise and fun in order to develop prevention, lower disease and the associated costs.

title: ⭐Self-Sovereign DID Badge Passports
description: Today's factory-based education model is flawed. Its average-size-fits-all model ignores kids' differences & fails to recognise strengths.

title: DIDs for public services in the US
description:
Trying to make local government interactions frictionless using DIDs and DIDs documents.

Decentralize public data access and ownership.

title: DID for verified Career Audit Trail
description: Keeping your CV, references and skills current is an ongoing, cumbersome effort. The facts are not checked or verified wasting time & money.

title: ACADEMY Lifelong Learning Suite
description: Acquiring and maintaining knowledge needs a radically new approach. The methods of early industrial society are insufficient & outdated.

title: Universal Skills Authentication
description: Individuals need a trusted way to communicate their skills, due to online learning, changing jobs and associated reskilling requirements

title: Proof of identity for mediators
description: It is not feasible for parties to verify identity and credentials of mediators that are supposed to provide aid in solving a dispute.

title: DID as a bridge to Microsoft
description: Atala Prism are not alone in leveraging the DID standard. Collaboration with partners will improve the product and lead to greater adoption.

title: Education verification with DID
description:
Fresh grads find it hard to share & track physical edu certificates.

Employers find it is too costly to verify one's edu certificates.

title: CUBI Cardano Universal Basic Income
description: There does not exist a universal or partial basic income system built on the Cardano blockchain for individuals in need of financial help.

title: MySmartWill: evolution for tomorrow
description: Digital individuals don't have a way to formalize and keep his wills in a secure, confidential, certified and unchangeable manner

title: Interoperability as growth driver
description: No integrations are yet available with well adopted DID frameworks.

title: Verify NFT authenticity [NFT-MAKER]
description: Authenticity is a big problem in the NFT space. Art gets stolen, buyers get scammed & artists have a hard time verifying their art.

title: Cardano Grants Management Systems
description: Identity theft is a big headache. It can take days & sometimes weeks to get new credit cards, ID cards, & Passports.

title: Import passport data to AtalaPrism
description: A valid government ID in AtalaPrism is required to use municipal or financial services. This can only be issued by a local government office

title: A Passive Interface Pair (DID)
description: Exploring privacy and surveillance issues surrounding biometric DIDs emerging from indigenous and outlier communities.

title: BingoChain - User Authentication
description: Atala Prisim users want a simple way to log in to various sites so they can control their privacy.

title: Your DID for climate impact
description: Everyone should play a role in addressing the climate emergency? But what is my impact and how can I mitigate it?

title: DARP: Cardano Address Name Service
description: Developers & users need easy to use addresses in dApps & wallets, for user experience & backend integration (e.g. smart contracts, NFT data)

title: Generic certification solution
description: Thousands of small businesses and organizations are certifying skills and knowledge in the analog world. How can we onboard them to Cardano?

title: Cardano Interop NOW
description: Decentralized Digital Identity using VCs and DIDs is booming but faces infrastructure bottlenecks. Cardano interop will accelerate adoption.

title: Decentralized Certificates
description: Certificates currently need to be issued by reputable organizations to have merit, but this process requires trust and is often slow

title: Maternity Medical data in Ethiopia
description: There is no centralized medical data system in Ethiopia, and mothers are losing a lot of money through redundant medical tests.

title: Distributed Health Records
description: There are no open source quality software solutions for developing healthcare applications, which limits access to developing nations.

title: Dvoting System in Brazil
description: The lack of a single platform easily auditable where it is used exclusively to create projects of popular initiative by the community.

title: Paths to adopt DID in small cities
description: Large countries may be slow to adopt DID, but municipal governments can start the charge. What are the best routes for them to take?

title: DIDs for Animal Records
description: How to encourage the mass adoption of Atala-Prism for animal records?

title: Biometric<->DID Binding Credential
description: Verifiers must be convinced of a subject's. Identity, based on what they hold, know, and who they are. The "who" is often missing.

title: Tutorchain.io - Expert identity
description: Finding an expert or monetizing your expertise requires centralized vetting services that limit your choices and control your access.

title: Welcome to the Oasis, Please Login
description: No killer app exists to bring a mass number of people into the Cardano ecosystem utilizing Decentralized IDs.

title: Optimizing student agency with DIDs
description: Inequity in educational policies widens opportunity and resource gaps which systematically hinders student performance.

title: African Housing Payments App
description: Informal identity and payment records prevent customers with good payment histories from establishing credit reputations for future finance

title: Biometric Smart Card Integration
description: There is a disconnect between the physical and digital world. Mobile credentials are still weak in areas, while some may not have phones.

title: gigDID
description: Atala PRISM must reach the largest and fastest growing labor force for MASS SCALE adoption.
